summary: Project includes a vendor item-adding flow that needs predefined product categories.
architectural_notes: Define and maintain a canonical list of item categories used in the vendor item-adding flow (Fruits, Vegetables, Spices, Groceries, Snacks, Beverages, Household/Toiletries).

existing_features.title: Define a fixed set of product categories for the app, using exactly these English category labels: "Fruits", "Vegetables", "Spices", "Groceries", "Snacks", "Beverages", and "Household/Toiletries".
Add a required Category selector to the vendor add-product form, using the predefined categories, and include the selected category in the add-product mutation call.
Update the buyer-facing store UI to reflect the new category set (Fruits, Vegetables, Spices, Groceries, Snacks, Beverages, Household/Toiletries) in the "Shop by Category" section.
Ensure frontend backend type bindings used by the React app are updated so the Product type includes the new category field without TypeScript errors.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add/select item categories for vendor items (e.g., Fruits, Vegetables, Spices, Groceries, Snacks, Beverages, Household/Toiletries)
Extend the backend Product model to include a category field, and update product creation to persist the selected category for each product.

projectName: Add predefined product categories and require category selection for vendor-added items
